name: Fjallraven Ovik Knit Sweater - Men's
description: Warm and dependable, this patterned wool sweater is ready for your daily adventures. Named after Fjällräven’s home town, the Ovik collection offers timeless scandi style that wears well.Knit from soft, traceable wool.Reinforced elbows resist abrasion.Raglan sleeves provide unrestricted movement.Regular fit wears like an old favourite.
